Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory249.png'}
{3: 'After bidding farewell to Mr. Door, the team has returned to the place outside the city.'}
{3: 'According to Ayla, everyone needs to return to the city or the village to put an end to their hero journey.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant? What would heroes do after completing their duties?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do what they want to do, probably.', 3: '8'}
{3: "Just like the adventure never happened... Heroes will return to their home and open their dusted door with a key they haven't used for a long time."}
{3: 'Or, they will spend another long journey with friends.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Will we... ever see that day?', 4: '1'}
{3: "...Honestly, it's a difficult question."}
{3: 'Cerberus seems to be waiting for a long time. They walk out of the shadow and confront Gray Raven, with Vera standing in front.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I need to remind you that the main mission is complete...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Does that mean we are dismissed?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Sorry, Vera, we didn't know that Cerberus was also in the game, so...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: '...I think you got me wrong.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera points her blade to you all.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'm here for the treasure.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Sorry, we don't have it.", 3: '39'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The Realm of Dragons is nothing but an empty shell.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Mission rewards?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What did you get then?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Gray Raven members look at one another. They only smile without answering.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Fine, whatever. Let's just start the battle.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "But Vera, we don't need to fight. The mission in the Realm of Dragons is over.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Mission...? Cerberus never took anything like that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'We just feel that killing the hero team is more fun than doing routine missions.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'When Vera and her team are about to attack, some familiar figures stand in front of Gray Raven.'}
{3: "It's the ex-hero wizard and his friends."}
{2: 'Travelling Wizard', 3: 'As a former hero, I will never allow such a thing to happen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Travelling Wizard', 3: 'Because I am their friend.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hah, I thought we were having some tough opponents. Turned out it was you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Did you drag Gray Raven into this because you were scared of my revenge?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Travelling Wizard', 3: 'A-anyway, my comrades will never let you hurt the heroes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Knight', 3: 'Why are you still not punished for that mouth?'}
{3: 'Despite his words, the knight still holds up his shield and stands in the very front.'}
{3: "The Travelling Wizard's team is not the only party here."}
{3: 'Riding on the warhorses, the remaining members of the expedition also come to the rear of Cerberus.'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'I never thought riding a horse could be so challenging. Just looking at the simulated graphics alone drives me dizzy.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's Commandant Simon. Dark Aries is here too.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "But why is there so much red text in Simon's status bar?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: "Don't worry. As long as I can keep rolling critical success, I won't die...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Palma', 3: 'Even if you do, our mission is probably already completed anyway... Speaking of which, who should write the mission report if Captain dies?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "You have been following us all along, but we just couldn't get rid of you. I will give you credit for that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "But it's time to call it a day, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noctis knocks his fists together and stands in front of Dark Aries.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'No. 21 summons her Co-Bot, then looks at Gray Raven behind the knight.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Travelling Wizard', 3: 'Um, excuse me, heroes...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Travelling Wizard', 3: 'You look like you already know them for a long time. May I ask about your relationship?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's quite complicated...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "But it's actually not hard to understand.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'We are all comrades.', 3: '123'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Just like that, the battle begins.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'After so many years, the Realm of Dragons becomes lively again among the magic and explosions.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory294.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory294.png'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Our heroes will continue to embark on a future journey with their friends.', 4: '1'}
